title: VA - Time Life - The Folk Years [bin+cue]
description:
[ This is a conversion of http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6151575/VA_-_Time_Life_-_The_Folk_Years into bin/cue pairs that can be used to burn the original discs. All cue files contain DISCID for CDDB look-ups. I've also generated a text file containing all the meta-data for each song. ]

[ For MP3 (320kpbs), please see: https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10191982/VA_-_Time_Life_-_The_Folk_Years_%5BMP3_320kpbs%5D ]
